MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL11 postcode area of Wrexham, affecting properties in Llandegla and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficult weather conditions on site for our engineers to isolate a fault on the overhead line network and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.47PM on 13th February 2021.
